dictionary.name: _code
dictionary.string: "// An unusual linear stretching effect.&#000a;uniform vec2 center = vec2(0.5, 0.5);&#000a;&#000a;vec2 normCoord = 2.0 * UV - vec2(1.0);&#000a;vec2 normCenter = 2.0 * center - vec2(1.0);&#000a;&#000a;normCoord -= normCenter;&#000a;vec2 s = sign(normCoord);&#000a;normCoord = abs(normCoord);&#000a;normCoord = 0.5 * normCoord + 0.5 * smoothstep(0.25, 0.5, normCoord) * normCoord;&#000a;normCoord = s * normCoord;&#000a;&#000a;normCoord += normCenter;&#000a;&#000a;COLOR = tex(TEXTURE, normCoord / 2.0 + vec2(0.5));"
